text:
Appropriate adjustments shall be made in rent supplement payments to reflect household income changes shown by the annual tenant income recertification. Rent supplement payments shall be discontinued when it is determined that 30 percent of the tenant's household income is sufficient to pay the full amount of the rent for the unit occupied by the tenant. Where a tenant is no longer entitled to rent supplement payments, he or she may continue to occupy the unit provided he or she pays the full amount of the rent. 
(Added by Ord. 290-72, App. 10/10/72; amended by Ord. 243-00, File No. 001309, App. 10/27/2000)
